## ModalKitPredicate

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/components/v1/modal/ModalKit.ts" sourceLine="21" packageName="commandkit" />

The predicate function that filters modal interactions.
It receives a ModalSubmitInteraction and returns a boolean or a Promise that resolves to a boolean.

```ts title="Signature"
type ModalKitPredicate = (
  interaction: ModalSubmitInteraction,
) => Awaitable<boolean>
```
